Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Student(java.lang.String StudentID)
      creates a new student object accepting the student's ID as a parameter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void autoAssign()
      This method does the auto assigning of compulsory subjects as set by determined by the syllabus it creates an array of subject codes that have to be auto assigned and passes it to the set subjects method that accepts the array as a parameter.It has no return value.
      void CreateNewLoginAccount(java.lang.String Username, java.lang.String Password)
      creates a new login account for the student with the desired username and password

      adds the new student in the system accepting the name, surname, phone number and grade as parameters

      • setSubjects

        public void setSubjects(java.lang.String[] newSubjects,
                        java.lang.String[] oldSubjects)
        Updates the subjects done by a student who wishes to either replace a subject with a new one or drop a subject completely
        Parameters:
        newSubjects - (This is an array of the new subject codes that will replace the old subject registrations)
        oldSubjects - (This is an array of th old subject codes to help get to the precise subject registration to be replaced)

      • setStudentSubjects

        public void setStudentSubjects(java.lang.String[] subjectCodes)
        method accepts a subject code array with the subject codes. there is no set size and this means it can expand and contract as needed. has no return value. Adds the subjects chosen by the new student. Accepts an array of subject codes which should be added
        Parameters:
        subjectCodes -

      • autoAssign

        public void autoAssign()
        This method does the auto assigning of compulsory subjects as set by determined by the syllabus it creates an array of subject codes that have to be auto assigned and passes it to the set subjects method that accepts the array as a parameter.It has no return value. Calls the setSubjects Method

      • returnAllTextBooks

        public void returnAllTextBooks()
        returns all the textbooks assigned to the student represented by the the object's state

      • gettextBooks

        public java.lang.String gettextBooks()
        Gets all the unreturned textbooks in the current year
        Returns:
        String representation of all owed textbooks

      • updateSubjectRegistration

        public void updateSubjectRegistration(java.lang.String oldSubjectCode,
                                      java.lang.String newSubjectCode)
        Parameters:
        oldSubjectCode -
        newSubjectCode - Method updates the subjects done individually.(Per Record). This is done to minimize the doing of unnecessary update processes Accepts two parameters, oldSubjectCode is the subject Code registered in the database (of the subject the student is leaving behind), newSubjectCode is the subject Code the student is replacing it with. if there is no new subject to be undertaken then the old record is deleted
